ruinedfood.name: Ruined Food
ruinedfood.flavour_text: Food spoiled by acidic rain. Almost inedible, but you can't afford to be picky.

cannedmeat.name: Canned 'Meat'
cannedmeat.flavour_text: Mass-produced, food-grade... Something. You got the factory in working condition, but the ingredients are best left unknown. This was probably intended to be a short-term solution for a long-term problem. Tastes better than it smells, though not by a lot.

freshproduce.name: Fresh Produce
freshproduce.flavour_text: An assortment of leafy greens, juicy fruit and root vegetables. Packed with vitamins, each bite better than the last. The literal fruits of your labor.

grasses.name: Desert Grasses
grasses.flavour_text: After the great war, almost all forms of plant life were wiped out. These bitter grasses are hardy enough to survive anywhere, and can stave off starvation by just a little.

bugs.name: Crunchy Bugs
bugs.flavour_text: In the before times, bugs and other crawling critters were a source of fear, discomfort and pestilence. Now they're a free meal, if you're fast enough to catch them.

mre.name: MRE
mre.flavour_text: Military-grade leftovers from the great war. These dry rations carry a high nutritional value and hardly ever spoil, making them a valued commodity despite their bland taste.

jerky.name: Mystery Jerky
jerky.flavour_text: The art of drying meat for later consumption has always been a staple of human survival, and comes in handy now more than ever. Most animals are gone, and very few can thrive in the wasteland... Some are unlucky enough to become food.
